items.title: Anker’s originally $60 7-in-1 USB-C charging station is 50% off today at $30
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Labor Day sale, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its 7-in-1 USB-C charging station for $29.99 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. This is originally a $60 unit that’s lately been sitting at the $40 mark. Today’s deal shaves an additional $10 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price we’ve tracked for it. You can also get this charging unit in white, though it’s currently going for $40. It’s a good option to consider if you’re looking to add a USB charging station that also has AC outlets, and you can learn more about it below.

more…

items.title: Sources: the US government restored xAI to its vendors list after removing it for Grok's antisemitic content; email: the White House asked GSA to add xAI "ASAP" (Zoë Schiffer/Wired)
items.summary:
Zoë Schiffer / Wired:
Sources: the US government restored xAI to its vendors list after removing it for Grok's antisemitic content; email: the White House asked GSA to add xAI “ASAP”  —  A partnership between xAI and the US government fell apart earlier this summer.  Then the White House apparently got involved, per documents obtained by WIRED.

items.title: Tesla releases Model Y Performance in Europe — will it staunch the bleeding?
items.summary: Tesla is offering a new performance version of its Model Y crossover for the European market. The new variant is aimed at boosting the company’s sales on the continent, which have been in free fall for most of the year thanks to growing competition from China and brand damage from Elon Musk’s fascist antics. items.title: Prime members can score Schumacher’s new 12A level 1 portable EV charger at a new $116 low (Reg. $160)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering Prime members a second chance at the best pricing on the new Schumacher SEV1670 12A Level 1 Portable EV Charger at $115.59 shipped. Only having been on the market since the end of May and carrying a $160 full price tag, it didn’t see its first discount until Prime Day when it fell to $128, which remained the lowest we’d seen it fall until today. Now, Prime members can enjoy the best new price we have tracked, which gives you $44 off the going rate and drops things $12 under the previous low.

Just be sure to also scope out one of the best prices ever on the official USB-C Apple Watch charging cable and these rare M4 Mac mini deals live for Labor Day weekend – $100 off 1TB models, 24GB configs, M4 Pro up to $200 off, and more. items.title: Pakistan says floods made worse by Indian action
items.summary: ISLAMABAD -Flooding in Pakistan from water flowing downstream from India was made worse by New Delhi's suspension of a river-sharing treaty and the collapse of the gates on an Indian barrage, Pakistani officials said on Friday.  Read full story

items.title: Head off-road with $434 in free gear on Lectric’s XPeak2 long-range e-bike at $1,699 for Labor Day
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Labor Day Sale running through the upcoming holiday, Lectric has increased several bundle packages on various EVs, including the XPeak2 Long-Range Off-Road e-bike that is getting $434 in free gear at $1,699 shipped. We’ve mostly been seeing this model get bundles ranging from $316 to $336 over 2025, with the increased package during this sale normally costing you $2,133 in full. Picking up this ride while the sale lasts scores you the additional gear of a rear cargo rack, fenders to go over both tires, an Elite headlight, a suspension seat post, a bottle holder and mounting adapter, a bottle-shaped e-bike lock, and water-resistant pannier bags.

items.title: Just $8.50 gets you this foldable 3-in-1 MagSafe travel charger with an adapter and cable today (56% off)
items.summary:
INIU 3-in-1 MagSafe travel charger with charger and USB-C cable

Buy for $8.50 (Reg. $20)

Clip the on-page 30% off coupon.

What we love

This is one of the more compact 3-in-1 chargers out there that can top up your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods simultaneously. It may not be the fastest unit out there – speeds top out at 7.5W for iPhone, 5W for AirPods, and 2.5W for Apple Watch – but it’s pretty good for overnight charging or in places where you don’t need the fastest charging speeds. What we love about this model is that it folds into a slim, pocketable form-factor when not in use, making it super compact and easy to carry around. The brand even includes a 20W charger and a Type-C cable to go with it.

more…
